page.title: 06EVENTS IN HOCKWOLD
page.content: Events in the village revolve around the various organisations.{The {Anglican Church}hold an annual fete in June at which produce stalls,side shows and sporting activities are in evidence.{Hockwold Primary School}held an Elizabethean Festival in July l985 which involved all the staff and children in a costume procession and crowning of the festival queen.Maypole and Morris Dancing took place against a backcloth of traditional activities such as Archery and pelting the Stocks.Strawberry and Cream teas were served,after which the afternoon ended with a productions of A Midsummer Nights Dream, and mass Country Dancing {Hockwold Village Club}celebrated the anniversary of{V.E.Day}with a costume party.
